Description_lang: Wrap the caster in flames that absorb up to $s2% of the caster's maximum health.While the shield holds, the caster has $s3% increased Haste and is immune to Silence and Interrupt effects, but burns for $384433s1% of their maximum health every $t2 sec.
AuraDescription_lang: Absorbing $w1 damage.Haste increased by $s3%.Immune to Silence and Interrupt effects.Burning for $384433s1% of maximum health every $t2 sec.
